TopicTitle: [Video] My KSP Trailer: Prospector 3 (Inspired by the Surveyor Program)

Articles.Content: Threw this together last night to try and draw a few friends into KSP. It's the first time I've made a movie (had never touched windows movie maker before). Let me know what you think! Edited September 15, 2012 by zombiphylax
Thank you! Hopefully my next one with be a bit more polished.
very nice....a few tihngs coulda been cut...but then again im no expert otherwise i like how you did it BTW the cameras how do you use them i got thme bu cant figur thm out
Why not do a Apollo 12 type mission to the Probe for another movie?
I was actually thinking about that, hence the analogue name to the Surveyor probe Apollo 12 was targeting.
I did a mission to my Mun Explorer I on Voyager labs page if you want to see the pics
I tried looking through your post history and couldn't find them...have you posted them on these forums already?
If you want I can supply a Stock 3 manned rocket for the Mun if you do the Apollo 12 mission.

While I appreciate the offer, I've been tinkering with a 3 man craft that at least follows the Apollo flight trajectory (the docking happens mid-transit to the Mun instead of in LKO), if not somewhat resembles the Saturn series, for the past few weeks.

I really can't give an ETA of a video, though, my work schedule is a bit wonky at the moment. I've only had time for a Duna orbit, I haven't even had time to attempt the other planets. :\

If you have any interesting space station designs, even if using a couple of mod packs, I'd be interested. Thinking about a video eventually of a transfer to a space station and/or colony on/around another planet (or, possibly Laythe).

Edit: Hah! I just figured out you're part of a designer group! So, like I said, while I appreciate the offer for the Munar craft, I currently have something in mind. I might bug you for a probe later though.

Edited September 29, 2012 by zombiphylax

XD Dont worry me and my members can help with any order (Except maybe a hovercraft or something that is nearly impossible)

EDIT: I can make you a Space station core using Erkles Docking and Bace if you want?

Edited September 29, 2012 by Sbowyer28
That could be cool, not sure how soon I would need it though, so no rush, still haven't started the Apollo 12 video yet.
The core is easy to make, Just A Bace Node with Docking on each end of the node.
